data.name: King of Conquerors
data.detailed_description:
If you like this game, please add it to your wishlist~

Summary of the plot：

The rule of the empire was faltered by the war, and terrible monsters tore through the fragile walls of mankind
The decaying city is full of chaos and corruption, girls are sacrificed to cults, and nobles enjoy decadent happiness in the toil of slaves.
Here, heroes, wizards and thieves desperately pursue glory, wealth and power
This is a world where adventurers can be conquerors-conquerors can be kings

Can you survive the dangers of war and dark magic and seize the throne? Or will you meet your destiny in the forgotten ruins?

Game features:

All legends will start from here. In the world of conquerors, they have their own locations, creatures, factions, weather, and geography.
8 different profession categories, including swordsman, mage, assassin, priest, knight, prop master, dancer, shooter
Numerous career branches enable you to create unique characters, make your warrior become a magic swordsman or let your knight ride a griffon soaring in the sky!
Organize business among multiple cities, buy and sell common or rarest items, and earn the difference.
Run a thieves’ guild and send your minions to revel, smuggle, steal and perform other pranks.
Build a temple of wizards and explore forbidden magic. Develop powerful magic rituals, build puppets, craft magic items, and even turn yourself and your followers into undead.
Build strongholds, establish kingdoms, and form troops to explore unknown territories.
You will write the greatest legend in this living open sandbox world!

  • Is a turn-based, open world sandbox game.
  • Easy to use turn-based combat with rich strategies.
  • Various professions and unique skills, each profession has powerful nirvana.

data.short_description: Your journey from adventurer to king will begin here!
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks
